thread.title: BRIEF-The First Of Long Island Reports Q1 EPS $0.44

title: BRIEF-The First Of Long Island Reports Q1 EPS $0.44

organizations.name: brief-the first of long island reports

text:
April 30, 2018 / 6:45 PM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-The First Of Long Island Reports Q1 EPS $0.44 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
April 30 (Reuters) - First of Long Island Corp:
* THE FIRST OF LONG ISLAND CORPORATION ANNOUNCES 22.4% INCREASE IN NET INCOME AND 15.8% INCREASE IN EPS FOR THE FIRST QUARTER OF 2018 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.44
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.44 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* BOOK VALUE PER SHARE INCREASED 9.1% TO $14.44 AT 3/31/18 FROM $13.24 AT 3/31/17 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
